title: Jibiz
author: Jibiz
content: FIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMFIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.Welcome to the forum! It's great to see new people interested in cryptocurrency.While Bitcoin has gained significant popularity in recent years and there are many people who believe in the potential of decentralized currency that can provide greater financial freedom, I am suspicious about the data you provided. Can you provide any sources to back up the claim that 80% of the world's youth are interested in Bitcoin? It is always a good practice to research and verify any claims before accepting them as fact, and I don't believe that I have ever come across this information before.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on May 13, 2023, 03:59:16 PMQuote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMFIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.Can you provide any sources to back up the claim that 80% of the world's youth are interested in Bitcoin? It's a good thing to find Op's thought on bitcoin and the exaggerated percent of people he claim were aiming to have a currency like bitcoin. I don't understand it the same way you just did. Bitcoin is so good a currency for people to admire it or think of a currency that operates like bitcoin before Satoshi launched it. They're lots of digital money that existed before bitcoin, like e-gold, a sign that people craved for a currency that would operate without a middle man. However, my agreement with his exaggeration is not even, just that I understood his view differently. The fact that people mostly youths waited for a currency, bitcoin, doesn't mean they'll be interested in bitcoin when it launched for some reasons best known by the individuals. "You asked for change, we gave you coins." - Casascius

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk Op. And sine you're new to the forum you might as well want to spend some of your time going through the rules and regulations of the forum so as to avoid getting your account into any problem that might later affect your stay here in the forum.Here's the link to the rule: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0With that being said, if you want to engage in discussions here and you have no knowledge about Bitcoin and cryptocurrency as a whole you might wanna check out this following links as they'll provide you with the basic knowledge you need about Bitcoin.Mastering Bitcoin (GitHub)The Internet of MoneyMastering the Lightning NetworkMastering EthereumBeginners & Help EncyclopediaAnd if you come across any terms that you don't understand during your learning journey feel free to ask here in the forum as you have members that are knowledgeable enough to provide you with the answer you seek.

comments.author: carter34
comments.body: Quote from: Accardo on May 13, 2023, 04:38:50 PMThe fact that people mostly youths waited for a currency, bitcoin, doesn't mean they'll be interested in bitcoin when it launched for some reasons best known by the individuals. What Op mean is the average number of people using bitcoin and this number are largely in youths no that true. the president of El Salvador adopting bitcoin in his country is youth   back when gold was use it was exclusive for the adults and advance age class but today bitcoin is largely use by youth age the old still more with banks.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Quotelunching team of BTCYea, correct. The lunching team of BTC did really great however I was part of the breakfast team. We were forced to stay awake and that is the only reason we couldn't do any major contribution to Bitcoin, the best Cryptocurrency on the planet Earth.The sort of projects new comers make here is so interesting and stupid at the same time.

comments.author: Jibiz
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on May 13, 2023, 03:59:16 PMQuote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMFIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.Welcome to the forum! It's great to see new people interested in cryptocurrency.While Bitcoin has gained significant popularity in recent years and there are many people who believe in the potential of decentralized currency that can provide greater financial freedom, I am suspicious about the data you provided. Can you provide any sources to back up the claim that 80% of the world's youth are interested in Bitcoin? It is always a good practice to research and verify any claims before accepting them as fact, and I don't believe that I have ever come across this information before.QuoteIn 2021, 94% of all crypto buyers are millennials and gen Zs’ under the age of 40Source link: https://triple-a.io/crypto-ownership-data/

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 05:16:46 PMQuoteIn 2021, 94% of all crypto buyers are millennials and gen Zs’ under the age of 40Source link: https://triple-a.io/crypto-ownership-data/This means that you are reading the data incorrectly. In your post, you claimed "80% of the world...", that's a very big number and I don't know what exactly you meant by that, but it's obviously wrong.From the source you quoted:QuoteAs of 2023, we estimated global crypto ownership rates at an average of 4.2%, with over 420 million crypto users worldwide."420 million crypto users" is approximately 5.3% of the total population of the world, that's not even close to 80%.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 05:16:46 PMQuoteIn 2021, 94% of all crypto buyers are millennials and gen Zs’ under the age of 40Source link: https://triple-a.io/crypto-ownership-data/You're reading the percentages wrong.It's 94% of all the buyers are millennials under the age of 40, there could be two or 1 million of them!That doesn't mean that 94% of the population is buying,  it doesn't mean the majority of millennials are buying or using crypto, and it doesn't mean anything from a global perspective. For example, if 9 people under 40 buy bitcoin and one over 40 does the same you have 90% of the buyers being millennials, but there are still only ten buyers.Quote from: decodx on May 13, 2023, 07:34:49 PM"420 million crypto users" is approximately 5.3% of the total population of the world, that's not even close to 80%.With the mempool clog happening with just 400k transactions, I really believe the 400 million! "users" number is pure bull!

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMFIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.Welcome to the forum!I agree, bitcoin is a great thing although I think your numbers and data are incorrect. Can you share the source of your information?I think many other people who have no connection to this forum are responsible for the promotion and development of bitcoin, but of course Satoshi was active here in the beginning and shared his vision of bitcoin.This forum is still relevant as a source of information about bitcoin and as a gathering place for the crypto community.

comments.author: lizarder
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMFIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.This is an idea that comes from the maturity of the concept and Satoshi is a generation that has never been mentioned in one of the founders of freedom that deserves to be awarded, because some see it as contrary to the previous system. Nearly all work has a purpose and I believe leads to the fulfillment stage of responsibility, but the question is how the former system can allow people to save money value in the future and almost certainly lose more value.While bitcoin is a generation that can be adjusted to save the value of the currency you have, the method is very simple, namely by buying and holding according to the desired time period. Welcome to the forum and do the right thing and you will find your way to success.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Bitcoin has come to give us financial freedom and nobody can take that freedom away from us,even the government have tried every possible way to do that but they have never succeeded, because in countries were bitcoin is banned,there are still people using bitcoin secretly. On your figure of 80%, you should understand what that means because I don't think that bitcoin has spread and has been adopted by everyone all over the world. Read and understand any article that you are reading and don't just jump into conclusion. The second advice for you is that when you are posting from an article,you should always drop the link,so that we can also go through it and have a proper understanding of what you are saying. This will also help other forum members to contribute perfectly on the topic.You are welcome to the forum.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMFIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.It could not have been possible without the early adopters and this platform who promote the usage and the advantages of Cryptocurrency, the community of believers has passed the hardest and most trying time, and we can thank the early developers and the innovators who contributed to the adoption of Bitcoin, they fave the way for latecomers and doubters and of course for the government to ease up on their restriction.You are not going to be the last, we will see more new people coming in here and thankful for this technology, its actually heaven-sent just when we are losing our valuable privacy.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PM.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.Nothing is above man, it was humans that created Bitcoin so Bitcoin isn't surpassing man, I would agree that Bitcoin is hard to predict, even if some claims to be able to predict Bitcoin I would say to prevent panic through fomo (fear of missing out) FUD (Fear uncertainty and doubt) it's best to do your own research and understand things yourself taking in account authentic news.Firstly welcome to the forum, very possible to be the biggest Bitcoin forum in the world but it's not only members here that sustain Bitcoin, Bitcoin is fast becoming generally accepted and there are many Bitcoin enthusiast out there that aren't yet on the forum.Rather than channeling your some worth over religious exaltation of Bitcoin you can actually channel it to learn more about Bitcoin especially the technology aspect this board is a great board to begin with the you can also check other boards like Bitcoin board and it's sub board.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMGenerational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.The users in this forum form a large chunk of the Bitcoin community, but the community spreads across other platforms other than this forum, so there are quite a lot of members of the community that are not active users in this forum. Bitcoin is an open source project, thus anyone can be involved, either via mining, running a full node, hodling, trading, etc, and they are all part of the reason why the network is working unhindered, big thanks to all of us.Having said that, many people erroneously think Bitcoin is a get rich quick scheme, and it propels them to make many mistakes whilst using Bitcoin, thus DYOR about the network to avoid making such mistakes.

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: There are a lot of Bitcoin users out there, but let's be honest - crypto adoption is still pretty low when you compare it to traditional finance. But that's actually good news for those who want to get in early and potentially make some serious gains as the market grows. If BTC ever gains the 80% population acceptance that the OP talks about, it's highly possible that its value will surpass $1 million per coin.

comments.author: DiMarxist
comments.body: Firstly welcome to the forum, very possible to be the biggest Bitcoin forum in the world Bitcointalk https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=post;topic=5452620.0;num_replies=15 but it's not only members here that sustain Bitcoin, Bitcoin is fast becoming generally accepted and there are many Bitcoin enthusiast out there that is  not in this forum. Bitcoin is an open source project, thus anyone can be involved, either via mining, running a full holding, trading, etc, and they are all part of the reason why the network is working unhindered. Bitcoin is stepping to populate in recent years and there are many people who believe in the potential of decentralized currency that can provide greater financial freedom.

comments.author: bbigtart
comments.body: First of all welcome to the Bitcointalk forum, I hope you last a long time in this forum.Yes, that's true, Satoshi Nakamoto and bitcoin are extraordinary. I am happy to be in this forum and get to know bitcoin. I can feel the change because bitcoin is an inflection point for me financially, and this is my best decision so far.Despite the skeptical view of bitcoin, when viewed from the increasingly widespread adoption of bitcoin by technology developers and major institutions in the world, it appears that interest in this bitcoin asset class is increasing from year to year.Especially in this increasingly digital era, many financial experts and institutional investors are starting to look at bitcoin as an attractive investment option.

comments.author: judeafante
comments.body: You're in the right place this is the best place to go for anything related to Bitcoin and other Cryptocurrencies and you are not late to the party there's a lot going on right now, especially now that halving is fast approaching, this forum is the main promoter of Bitcoin so if you want something to ask the community just go on and ask just follow the rules of the forum and you will not loss your track here.

comments.author: lixer
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on May 14, 2023, 11:43:38 AMQuote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 03:37:25 PMFIRST TIME HEREKudos to the founder satoshi nakamoto and the lunching team of BTC crypto-currency.It's like a mystery: beyond mere human explanation, what we all enjoy and 80% of the world, mostly youths, working and none working class's aim and admiring and dream currency, was found in 2009.The geometry progression of this innovative individual idea: BTC, surpasses man and his ordinary prediction.Generational thanks to the founder and the forum members for sustaining this great and wonderful virtual crypto-currency.It could not have been possible without the early adopters and this platform who promote the usage and the advantages of Cryptocurrency, the community of believers has passed the hardest and most trying time, and we can thank the early developers and the innovators who contributed to the adoption of Bitcoin, they fave the way for latecomers and doubters and of course for the government to ease up on their restriction.You are not going to be the last, we will see more new people coming in here and thankful for this technology, its actually heaven-sent just when we are losing our valuable privacy.It's actually true that the Bitcointalk forum contributed a lot to the adoption of Bitcoin and in spreading the word about it, and we must acknowledge that signature campaigns played a pretty big role in that since people used to join and still join this forum after hearing that they can earn money from this forum and that has contributed greatly towards Bitcoin adoption in the mainstream world.Satoshi himself probably didn't know that Bitcoin will become this much popular and successful, he said that it will either become too successful or will fail miserably, but it succeeded and brought a change in the world as an emerging technology.
